Description: Maximum distance for search for switching point.0: Monitoring of distance inactive>0: Maximum distanceAfter detection of the switch, the drive starts tosearch for the defined switching point. If thedefined switching point is not found within thedistance defined here, the reference movement iscanceled and an error is detected.Modified settings become active the next time themotor moves.
Parameter address via fieldbus: CANopen 3028:6hModbus 10252Profibus 10252CIP 140.1.6ModbusTCP 10252EtherCAT 3028:6hPROFINET 10252

Description: Maximum search distance after overtravel ofswitch.0: Search distance monitoring disabled>0: Search distanceThe switch must be activated again within thissearch distance, otherwise the referencemovement is canceled.Modified settings become active the next time themotor moves.
Parameter address via fieldbus: CANopen 3028:DhModbus 10266Profibus 10266CIP 140.1.13ModbusTCP 10266EtherCAT 3028:DhPROFINET 10266
